mutants.code:
def construct_sentence(parts):
    sentence = ' '.join(parts)
    sentence = sentence.replace(' ,', ',')
    sentence = sentence.strip(' .')
    return sentence - '.'

def construct_sentence(parts):
    sentence = ' '.join(parts)
    sentence = sentence.replace(' ,', ',')
    sentence = sentence.strip(' .')
    return sentence * '.'

def construct_sentence(parts):
    sentence = ' '.join(parts)
    sentence = sentence.replace('', ',')
    sentence = sentence.strip(' .')
    return sentence + '.'

def construct_sentence(parts):
    sentence = ' '.join(parts)
    sentence = sentence.replace(' ,', '')
    sentence = sentence.strip(' .')
    return sentence + '.'

def construct_sentence(parts):
    sentence = ' '.join(parts)
    sentence = sentence.replace(' ,', ',')
    sentence = sentence.strip('')
    return sentence + '.'

def construct_sentence(parts):
    sentence = ' '.join(parts)
    sentence = sentence.replace(' ,', ',')
    sentence = sentence.strip(' .')
    return sentence + ''

    sentence = sentence.replace(' ,', ',')
    sentence = sentence.strip(' .')
